body_html:
Peng, you can set loss_fn argument of `multi_class_head`. We can add an example to the documentation of `multi_class_head`. What do you think?
…
On Fri, Jun 22, 2018 at 9:04 AM Peng Yu ***@***.***> wrote: i mean it would add value for users that, they can easily switch to one vs all mode, using multi_class_head without need to change the label tensor. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Peng, you can set loss_fn argument of `multi_class_head`. We can add an
example to the documentation of `multi_class_head`. What do you think?

On Fri, Jun 22, 2018 at 9:04 AM Peng Yu <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> i mean it would add value for users that, they can easily switch to one vs
> all mode, using multi_class_head without need to change the label tensor.
>
